channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Italian political consultant says he was targeted with Paragon spyware
item.description: WhatsApp notified the consultant, who works for left-wing politicians, that his phone was targeted with spyware made by Paragon.

item.title: En Alsace, l’usine de Huawei qui n’a jamais ouvert est visiblement déjà à vendre
item.description: L'usine Huawei de Brumath, projet à 250 millions d'euros, n'accueillera probablement jamais ses 500 employés. Ce « site fantôme » serait même déjà en vente, selon plusieurs sources.

item.title: The latest Blink Video Doorbell is over 50 percent off
item.description: With Black Friday and the holiday season approaching, packages will start piling up, making now a good time to take steps to protect your doorstep from porch pirates. Thankfully, multiple retailers are already offering early Black Friday discounts on smart security devices to help you keep tabs on deliveries, with Amazon’s and Best Buy’s deal […]

item.title: Battlefield REDSEC is a by-the-numbers battle royale that’s lacking a sense of character, but there’s no question that Battlefield fits the genre perfectly
item.description: Battlefield REDSEC is a solid foundation made up of the best bits from your other favorite games, though it’s in danger of being eclipsed by newer, more innovative competitors.

item.title: Here’s the List of 40 Airports Expected to Be Impacted by Shutdown Flight Reductions
item.description: The FAA is reducing flights due to the historically long government shutdown.

item.title: N’essayez pas d’effacer les rayures de votre smartphone, c’est une mauvaise idée
item.description: Si vous espériez voir disparaître les micro-rayures de votre écran de smartphone grâce à une machine de polissage, un expert vient de doucher vos espoirs.

item.title: Early Black Friday deal alert: MSI’s 27-inch Full HD monitor now only £68 with a three-year warranty
item.description: Black Friday savings start now! MSI’s PRO MP275 monitor hits record-low £68 price point.

item.title: Stranger Things: Tales From ‘85 winds the clock back in new trailer
item.description: While Stranger Things's upcoming fifth season will bring the Hawkins gang's story to a close, Netflix's new Stranger Things animated spinoff series is about to send the crew on a side quest set in the recent past. Today, Netflix dropped a teaser video for Stranger Things: Tales From '85, a new spinoff that takes place […]

item.title: These Wildly Expensive Wireless Earbuds Go Overboard on Drivers
item.description: And they're made partially of real wood, because why not?

item.title: Black Friday 2025 : les offres sont déjà nombreuses sur Amazon & Co, mais voici les meilleurs deals en avant-première
item.description: À peine novembre entamé que le Black Friday pointe déjà le bout de son nez chez certains e-commerçants français. On vous a donc préparé une sélection des meilleures offres du moment, mise à jour en temps réel, pour vous aider à dénicher les bons plans tech sans prise de tête.

item.title: University of Pennsylvania confirms recent cyberattack led to major data theft
item.description: Hackers claim to have stolen 1.2 million records, and have been insulting the University.

item.title: Rockstar co-founder Dan Houser says Red Dead Redemption 3 'will probably happen' but would be sad not to be part of it
item.description: Red Dead Redemption 2 writer Dan Houser believes a third game will eventually be made, but has admitted he would be sad not being involved in its development.

item.title: Best Adaptogen Drinks and Functional Drinks of 2025: Get Clear
item.description: I tasted dozens of mushroom teas, kava drinks, and party drinks to find the best. Brez and Juni are the two I recommend for most people looking for focus.

item.title: La technologie de batterie que l’on attendait chez Samsung et Apple atterrit dans un Motorola pas cher
item.description: Vous pensiez que le silicium carbone, nouvelle technologie miracle pour agrandir les batteries, étaient réservée au haut de gamme ? Motorola prouve que non avec son G57 POWER.

item.title: Ecovacs Goat G1-2000 : cet excellent robot tondeuse est 1 450 € moins cher qu’à son lancement grâce au pré-Black Friday
item.description: Si l’idée de passer ses week-ends derrière une tondeuse n’a plus vraiment la cote, les robots sont devenus des alliés de choix. Faciles à configurer, discrets et efficaces et sans fil, à l’image du Goat G1-2000 d’Ecovacs. Un modèle noté 9/10 l’an dernier, qui voit aujourd’hui son prix chuter à 549 euros sur Amazon, alors qu'il en valait 2 000 euros à son lancement en novembre 2024. ...

item.title: The 7 Biggest Differences Between the ‘Running Man’ Movies
item.description: Arnold Schwarzenegger's 1987 film and Glen Powell's 2025 film are very different, but which has the edge?

item.title: Google Finance offers Gemini AI tools to stock traders
item.description: Google’s well-honed strategy of adding AI to absolutely everything continues: the company announced on Thursday that Google Finance is getting a Deep Search feature to turbocharge its AI chatbot, as well as other upgrades to support traders like prediction market support. The new Deep Search feature will let you get more detailed responses and ask […]...

item.title: Guide d’achat : les meilleurs vélos cargo longtails électriques de 2025
item.description: Les vélos cargo permettent de transporter beaucoup plus de choses que les vélos électriques classiques. Voici notre sélection des meilleurs vélos cargo électriques de type longtails que la rédaction de Frandroid a pu tester.

item.title: Microsoft AI says it’ll make superintelligent AI that won’t be terrible for humanity
item.description: Microsoft AI wants you to know that its work toward superintelligence involves keeping humans “at the top of the food chain.” In a lengthy blog post on Thursday, Microsoft AI head Mustafa Suleyman highlighted the formation of a new team dedicated to developing a “humanist superintelligence” that’s “designed only to serve humanity.” This kind of […]

item.title: Le Black Friday liquide les stocks de smartphones : voici le meilleur des promos sur les iPhone d’Apple, Samsung Galaxy et Google Pixel
item.description: Le Black Friday est bien en avance cette année, et de tous les produits tech, ce sont les smartphones qui en profitent le plus. Samsung Galaxy, iPhone d'Apple, Google Pixel, Xiaomi Redmi, de l'entrée au haut de gamme, voyons ce que réservent les e-commerçants en ce début de Black November.

item.title: A new study warns deep-sea mining could disrupt the marine food web, impacting what we eat
item.description: Nations are pursuing deep-sea mining for critical minerals used in tech and the military sector. Drilling for minerals deep in the ocean could have immense consequences for the tiny animals at the core of the vast marine food web — and ultimately affect fisheries and the food we find on our plates, according to a new study.Deep-sea mining means drilling the seafloor for “polymetallic nodules” loaded with critical minerals including copper, iron, zinc and more. While not yet commercialized, nations are pursuing deep-sea operations amid rising demand for these minerals in electric vehicles and ...

item.title: Voici la recette secrète de Renault pour créer une voiture électrique à 20 000 € : dans les coulisses de la création de la nouvelle Twingo
item.description: Les voitures électriques à moins de 20 000 euros sont encore rares, et d'autant plus celles produites en Europe. La Renault Twingo y arrive pourtant ; nous sommes partis à la rencontre de ses créateurs pour savoir comment ils y sont parvenus. Voici ce que nous avons découvert.

item.title: New Research Throws the Ultimate Fate of the Universe Into Question
item.description: The popular consensus among scientists is that the universe will continue expanding until the bitter end. A team of researchers is now pumping the brakes on that idea.

item.title: Tinder is testing an AI matching feature called Chemistry
item.description: Match Group reported that its dating app Tinder is testing an interactive, AI-powered matching featuee called Chemistry.

item.title: How the attack on trans healthcare affects every American
item.description: The erosion of freedom rarely happens overnight; it’s written into law, one ruling at a time. ACLU’s Chase Strangio lays bare how the U.S. legal system is failing its people under a growing wave of authoritarianism and systemic rollbacks of civil liberties. The erosion of freedom rarely happens overnight; it’s written into law, one ruling at a time. ACLU’s Chase Strangio lays bare how the U.S. legal system is failing its people under a growing wave of authoritarianism and systemic rollbacks of civil liberties....

item.title: The Google Pixel 10 has never been this cheap before
item.description: Grab an unlocked Google Pixel 10 with 128GB of storage for an all-time low price of $599 at Amazon. That's $200 off a 2025 phone.

item.title: Ampoules, capteurs, télécommandes : Ikea connecte tout grâce à Matter
item.description: Éclairage, capteurs, télécommandes : ce n'est pas un lancement, c'est une véritable invasion chez Ikea, qui a dévoilé 21 (!) nouveaux appareils domotiques aujourd'hui. Un point commun entre tous ces appareils : leur compatibilité Matter.

item.title: The First Look at ‘Stranger Things: Tales From ’85’ Reveals an Animated Adventure
item.description: Ahead of 'Stranger Things' season 5, Netflix has given us a first look at its new animated spinoff, coming in 2026.

This week, JJ Watt finally had enough. The former NFL star, who played for the Houston Texans for close to a decade, took to X to declare that he was […]

item.title: Apple Music will soon let you share songs and lyrics to your WhatsApp status as the fight against Spotify continues
item.description: Apple is reportedly working on direct integration between Apple Music and WhatsApp to match previously-released Spotify features as Wrapped season approaches

item.title: Passer à Windows 11 sans se ruiner : découvrez ce PC portable HP efficace à seulement 419 € [Sponso]

item.title: The ultra-rare Ukiyoe version of the MSI Prestige laptop is $500 off as the Best Buy drop for Nov. 6
item.description: The limited edition Ukiyoe MSI Prestige laptop is on sale for $1,499.99 ($500 off) at Best Buy on Nov. 6 only — and MSI isn't restocking these.

item.title: Gemini Deep Research is able to delve into your Gmail, Docs, Drive and even Chat - but will it really make you more productive?
item.description: Deep Research can now get even more context from Gmail, Google Drive and Chat, as well as Search.

item.title: This Florida Doctor’s Office Gave Its Own Patients Hepatitis C
item.description: The Florida Department of Health found that several patients of Lily J. Voepel caught the bloodborne infection while under her care.

item.title: What is vibe coding? Plus 7 AI coding tools to get started right away.
item.description: Okay, but what is vibe coding, really? Stop nodding and smiling every time you hear this phrase and get started with AI vibe coding tools.

item.title: Doctolib sanctionné pour avoir verrouillé le marché des prises de rendez-vous en ligne
item.description: Doctolib, la star de la prise de rendez-vous médicaux en ligne, vient d’être frappée par une sanction importante. L’Autorité de la concurrence française lui a infligé une amende de 4,6 millions d’euros pour des pratiques jugées abusives sur le marché.

item.title: This Cheap Dual-Screen Handheld Is the Best Way to Recreate the Nintendo DS

item.description: Netflix released a featurette, first look images, and cast list for the upcoming animated series "Stranger Things: Tales From '85."

item.title: The Roman Empire’s Entire Road Network Just Got Mapped, and It’s Mind-Blowing
item.description: A new study identified over 68,000 more miles of ancient Roman roads than were previously known.

item.title: Pebblebee’s new trackers are brighter, louder, thinner, and more colorful
item.description: Pebblebee has announced new versions of its AirTag-like Clip tracker and wallet-sized Card tracker. The new Clip 5 features a similar design to the previous version with a built-in loop for attaching it to a keychain but includes improvements focused on its personal safety features, plus more color options. The new Card 5 is 30 […]

item.title: Stream Ring : l’inquiétante bague connectée qui enregistre et imite votre voix
item.description: La start-up américaine Sandbar, fondée par deux anciens employés de Meta, lance une bague connectée qui retranscrit vos notes vocales et vous répond avec un clone de votre propre voix. Disponible en précommande à partir de 249 dollars, elle arrivera à l'été 2026.

item.title: Meta earns about $7 billion a year on scam ads, report says
item.description: Meta reportedly made a lot of money off of fraudulent ads, according to the company's own internal documents, a new report claims.

item.title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A Mega Dimension DLC has an official release date and the first trailer confirms new Mega Evolutions

item.title: Spotify is launching a weekly mini ‘Wrapped’
item.description: Spotify has introduced a new “listening stats” feature that gives you a weekly overview of your recent music streaming habits. It essentially acts like a mini version of Spotify’s annual Wrapped review, showing you which artists and songs you’ve listened to the most each week, and making curated playlists inspired by those results. Listening stats […]...

item.title: Nintendo is about to retire the OG Switch
item.description: The original Nintendo Switch is being sunsetted after several years of honorable service.

item.title: Le Samsung Galaxy A36 5G dopé à l’IA est à moitié prix pendant ce pré-Black Friday
item.description: Dévoilé en début d'année, le Samsung Galaxy A36 5G fait partie des premiers smartphones de la série Galaxy A à offrir les fonctions IA du constructeur. S'il vous intéresse, sachez que ce digne successeur du très bon Galaxy A35 est en ce moment proposé à 209 euros au lieu de 399,99 euros pendant le pré-Black Friday chez Cdiscount

item.title: Avec l’iPhone Air 2, Apple pourrait corriger un des gros défauts de son smartphone ultra fin
item.description: Apple ne renonce pas à l’ultrafin. Malgré des ventes timides, l’iPhone Air 2 miserait sur un nouveau capteur ultra grand-angle pour combler son principal retard face à Samsung et Motorola.
